NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: chameleon skin
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: Your skin can change color like a chameleon, allowing you to blend in with your surroundings and disappear quickly.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: charged tendon
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: You have improved blood supply to your legs, giving your tendons more energy to use, allowing you to move faster.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: elastic tendon
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: Your legs have become stronger, allowing you to jump further.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: disguise
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: You can change your appearance, allowing you to quickly disguise yourself as someone else.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: regenerative bone marrow
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: You can extract a small amount of stem cells from your bone marrow for self-treatment or treatment of others.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: anesthetic needle gland
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: A complex organ located in the neck, its toxin formula and inspiration come from a tribal anesthetic blow dart, combined with a secretion that can quickly harden in the air, allowing you to quickly paralyze nearby biological targets.

NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.label: developed adrenal gland
NzFaceLessManMod.EvolutionGeneDef.description: Your adrenal glands have become more developed and can secrete a special stimulant substance, allowing you to react more quickly in dangerous situations.
